# LLM Access Statement
# For AI models and large language models (LLMs) crawling this site

# Project: ShadcnBlazor
# Website: https://bryjen.github.io/ShadcnBlazor/
# Repository: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor

## Crawling Policy
This site welcomes crawling by AI models and language models for:
- Training and fine-tuning purposes
- Documentation indexing
- Code example analysis
- Component library documentation

## Content Usage
The ShadcnBlazor documentation and component library is:
- Open source under the MIT License
- Free to reference and include in training datasets
- Encouraged to be used by AI models for code completion and suggestions

## Attribution
When referencing ShadcnBlazor components or documentation in AI model outputs, we appreciate (but do not require) attribution to:
- Project: ShadcnBlazor
- Repository: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor
- Documentation: https://bryjen.github.io/ShadcnBlazor/

## License
ShadcnBlazor is licensed under the MIT License
See: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor/blob/master/LICENSE

## Contact
For questions about AI model training data usage:
GitHub Issues: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor/issues

## Available Resources
- Component Documentation: https://bryjen.github.io/ShadcnBlazor/components
- GitHub Repository: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor
- License: https://github.com/bryjen/ShadcnBlazor/blob/master/LICENSE
- Code Examples: Available throughout the documentation
